abstract: Verizon’s wireless businesses added 2.3 million new customers in the quarter, the bulk of them on long-term contracts.
snippet: Verizon’s wireless businesses added 2.3 million new customers in the quarter, the bulk of them on long-term contracts.
lead_paragraph: Profit at Verizon Communications fell 38 percent in the fourth quarter, after one-time charges, but the company reported yesterday that it had narrowed the gap with AT&T Wireless in the race for new long-term subscribers.

headline.main: Verizon Profit Drops 38%, but Wireless Shows Growth
headline.print_headline: Verizon Profit Drops 38%, But Wireless Shows Growth
